description: Assesses knowledge from first half of term through online and in-person components in Week 5. Covers skeletal, muscular, cardiovascular, respiratory and digestive systems.
Assesses knowledge from second half of term through online and in-person components in Week 10. Covers urinary/reproductive systems, nervous systems, and special senses.
2-hour exam during formal examination period with multiple-choice and short/long answer questions testing course content integration and problem-solving skills.
Weekly in-lab quizzes (Weeks 1-5, 7-9) testing lecture/practical content via MCQs. Best 6 of 8 results count equally towards final grade.
